00019 #include <machine.h>
00020 #include <scicos_block4.h>
00021 #include <ee.h>
00022 
00023 extern _t_ecan CanBuf[8];
00024 
00025 
00026 static uint8_t rxData[8] = { 0x91, 0x92, 0x93, 0x94, 0x95, 0x96, 0x97, 0x98 };
00027 static uint32_t canrx_id;     /* contain the id for can messages */
00028 static uint8_t mode;
00029 static uint8_t can_dlc=0;
00030 static uint8_t filterhit;
00031 static uint8_t bufnr;
00032 static uint8_t can_data_en=0;
00033 static uint8_t n_byte;
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 static EE_INT8 RXCan1(EE_UINT8 data){
00039         
00040         uint16_t rec_buf;
00041     filterhit = C1VECbits.FILHIT;
00042         bufnr = C1VECbits.ICODE;
00043         if (0 == (bufnr & 0x40))   //0x40 -> 0100 0000
00044                 {                                                
00045         if (can_data_en==0){
00046     EcanReadMessage((uint16_t)&CanBuf[(C1VEC & 0x1F)],&canrx_id,&can_dlc,(EE_UINT8 *)&rxData[0]);
00047     can_data_en=1;
00048                 
00049   } 
00050         
00051         
00052         //azzera il bit del buffer che ha generato l'interrupt
00053         rec_buf = 1 << bufnr;
00054     rec_buf ^= 0xFFFF;
00055     C1RXFUL1 &= rec_buf;
00056     
00057     if (1 == C1INTFbits.RBOVIF) C1INTFbits.RBOVIF = 0;
00058     
00059 
00060   }
00061         return 0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 void par_getstr(char * str, int par[], int init, int len);
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 static void init(scicos_block *block)
00070 {   
00071         EE_Can_Dma_Init();
00072         EE_Ecan1_Clk_Init();
00073         EE_Ecan1_RxInit(RXCan1);
00074         n_byte=block->ipar[0];
00075 }
00076 
00077 static void inout(scicos_block *block)
00078 {
00079   int i;
00080   double *enable = (double*) block->outptr[0];
00081   double *DATA = (double*) block->outptr[1];
00082 
00083   if (can_data_en==1){
00084                 
00085                 can_data_en=2;
00086                 if (can_dlc==n_byte){
00087                         for(i=0;i<can_dlc;i++) DATA[i]=(double) (rxData[i]);
00088                         enable[0]=1;}
00089                 can_data_en=0;
00090                 
00091         }
00092         else enable[0]=0;
00093         
00094 }
00095 
00096 static void end(scicos_block *block)
00097 {
00098   
00099 }
00100 
00101 void rt_CAN_INPUT(scicos_block *block,int flag)
00102 {
00103   if (flag==1){          /* set output */
00104     inout(block);
00105   }
00106   else if (flag==5){     /* termination */ 
00107     end(block);
00108   }
00109   else if (flag ==4){    /* initialisation */
00110     init(block);
00111   }
00112 }
